tool_description: Analyzes job descriptions to extract and categorize requirements into must-have, nice-to-have, and deal-breaker categories.

job_description_text.description: The complete job description text to analyze

industry_context.description: Industry context for better requirement classification

role_level.description: Seniority level: entry, mid, senior, lead, executive

error_messages: Empty job description: Provide a non-empty job description text for analysis.
Invalid role level: Must be one of [entry, mid, senior, lead, executive].
Text too short: Job description must contain at least 50 characters for meaningful analysis.
usage: Input a complete job description text and optionally specify industry context and role level. The tool will categorize all identified requirements by importance and type.

deal_breaker_requirements.description: Absolute requirements that cannot be compromised
